txt.en: 'In our absence, the local wolves have grown bold. I cannot have them harassing my crews while they work.\n\n'I would be grateful if you could discourage the wildlife from approaching us.'
You have defeated many wolves, and should report back to Dornach.\n\nTalk to Dornach at the lumber camp east of Ethring.
'I hope your actions have sufficiently dissuaded the vale-wolves from approaching us.'\n\nThey dismiss you with a nod.
While the lumber camp lay dormant, wolves moved into the surrounding woods.
Dornach has asked you to thin the number of wolves sharing the forest with his people.\n\nDefeat vale-wolves around the lumber camp east of Ethring.
